entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Canmore
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:16 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Banff 9:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: SW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Flurries or wet flurries early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm in a few localities. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
